extended_event_descriptor.text: When astronaut Leroy Chao's high-risk spacewalk is interrupted by bright lights flying past, it sparks a major investigation.
A deadly caiman targets Mehgan, but a potentially crippling accident leads to a shocking find - a coded message from the past that may bring them closer to gold. [

Beginning in Kathmandu, Josh Gates heads high into the Himalayas of Nepal to obtain scientific evidence of the legendary Yeti. This time his mission is personal, and it will take him into uncharted territory.
Each episode is focused on interesting and unusual artifacts held in museums. The show is hosted by Don Wildman and consists of over 80 episodes spread throughout seven seasons.
Bigfoot experts are called to Prince of Wales Island, Alaska to investigate a recent spike in Sasquatch activity. But can they track the elusive beast?
In the summer, the massive ice sheet melts on Greenland, revealing immense mineral wealth in the virgin rock for a group of eight American
When astronaut Leroy Chao's high-risk spacewalk is interrupted by bright lights flying past, it sparks a major investigation.
A deadly caiman targets Mehgan, but a potentially crippling accident leads to a shocking find - a coded message from the past that may bring them closer to gold. [

Josh Gates travels to the remote and landmine-riddled jungles of Cambodia to investigate the lost city of the Khmer Empire and search for a mystical relic that gave its God King the power to incinerate his enemies.
Jason, Steve, Dave and Shari head to Waynesville, Ohio, to investigate claims of aggressive paranormal activity at a former Catholic
Don Wildman uncovers the most macabre secret of the Wild West, a blood-sucking beast and a sinister haunting
Medium Amy Allen and retired detective Steve DiSchiavi explore a deadly legend and claims of paranormal activity at a tropical resort in Montego Bay, Jamaica
Ozzy and Sharon sit down to watch footage of suspected poltergeists, haunted dolls and UFOs. Can Jack convince his parents that these supernatural forces exist?
The team meets in Tennessee to investigate an abandoned prison with a brutal past and infamous inmates. What will they discovery in Petros?
The Wolfe County in Kentucky has a fresh trail of evidence that a 500 pound Wolfman is terrorizing the region. Can a group of hunters catch this monster
A house in Hinsdale, New York draws Nick and Katrina to investigate its demonic past, and Nick is caught in a psychological war against good and evil
The paranormal experts reopen Hans Holzer's case file on the Peck House in Rye, NY. They aim to find out if the tortured souls within have finally moved on. [12-A]
Each episode is focused on interesting and unusual artifacts held in museums. The show is hosted by Don Wildman and consists of over 80 episodes spread throughout seven seasons.
